00018 #ifndef _VHDSINGLETON_H__
00019 #define _VHDSINGLETON_H__
00020 
00021 #include <assert.h>
00022 
00023 // End SJS additions
00026 template <typename T> class vhdSingleton
00027 {
00028 protected:
00029 
00030     static T* ms_Singleton;
00031 
00032 public:
00033     vhdSingleton( void )
00034     {
00035         assert( !ms_Singleton );
00036                 ms_Singleton = static_cast <T*> (this);
00037     }
00038     ~vhdSingleton( void )
00039         {  assert( ms_Singleton );  ms_Singleton = 0;  }
00040     static T& getSingleton( void )
00041         {  assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton );  }
00042     static T* getSingletonPtr( void )
00043         {  return ( ms_Singleton );  }
00044         static void setSingletonPtr(T* ptrT)
00045         {
00046                 ms_Singleton=ptrT;
00047         }
00048 };
00049 
00050 
00051 #endif
